title: Chic Magazine Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019024318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chic1_6273.jpg)

love that C. And I appreciate your help.
author: Hellcat

comments.content: From the thickness of the bar in the H I think it is Didot by Hoefler+Frere-Jones
Good call - that is it indeed.
